column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////This cafe/bakery has a bright
column3: airy ambiance that feels quite European. Weather permitting
column4: I prefer sitting outside during peak hours for a more peaceful vibe. It gets wildly crowded inside and feels overstimulating to me. However
column5: the interior is beautiful and bright
column6: natural light shines in during daylight hours.
